name: GestationalDiabetes
title: Gestational Diabetes
description: This value set has not been clinical tested. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: ICD-9-CM codes that represent Gestational Diabetes),(Data Element Scope: ICD-9-CM codes that represent Gestational Diabetes),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains ICD-9-CM codes representing Gestational Diabetes during pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium. Codes include Gestational Diabetes controlled by diet, insulin, oral hypoglycemic drugs, and unspecified control. Code selection was informed by: https://newsletters.ahima.org/newsletters/Code_Write/2011/October/diabetes.html),(Exclusion Criteria: Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, steroid-induced Diabetes Mellitus, codes representing conditions occurring in infants born to a mother with Gestational Diabetes. Terminologies other than ICD-9-CM.)

concept.display: Abnormal glucose tolerance of mother, complicating pregnancy, childbirth, or the puerperium
Abnormal glucose tolerance of mother, unspecified as to episode of care or not applicable
Abnormal glucose tolerance of mother, delivered, with or without mention of antepartum condition
Abnormal glucose tolerance of mother, delivered, with mention of postpartum complication
Abnormal glucose tolerance of mother, antepartum condition or complication
Abnormal glucose tolerance of mother, postpartum condition or complication
